stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that a domain's SPF record includes a specific host
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the spf record for (?<domain>.+) should include (?<host>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check the validity of a domain's SPF record
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the spf record for (?<domain>.+) should be valid/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Create a Dynamics CRM Lead
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /create a dynamics crm lead/

expectedFieldsList.description: A map of field names to field values

guaranteedFieldsList.description: The date/time the Lead was created
The date/time the Lead was updated

stepDefinitionsList.name: Delete a Dynamics CRM Lead
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /delete the (?<email>.+) dynamics crm lead/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on a Dynamics CRM Lead
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>[a-zA-Z0-9_]+) field on dynamics crm lead (?<email>.+) should (?<operator>be less than|be greater than|be|contain|not be|not contain) (?<expectedValue>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (be, not be, contain, not contain, be greater than, or be less than)

guaranteedFieldsList.description: The date/time the Lead was created
The date/time the Lead was updated

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /enroll the (?<email>.+) hubspot contact into workflow (?<workflow>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on a HubSpot Contact
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+) field on hubspot contact (?<email>.+) should (?<operator>be less than|be greater than|be|contain|not be|not contain) (?<expectation>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check Current Workflow Enrollment of a HubSpot Contact
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<email>.+) hubspot contact should currently be enrolled in workflow (?<workflow>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that no link in an email is broken
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<position>\d+)(?:(st|nd|rd|th))? mailgun email for (?<email>.+) should not contain broken links/

expectedFieldsList.description: The nth message to check from the email's inbox

guaranteedFieldsList.description: Link Found In (e.g. HTML or Plain-Text)
HTTP Status code when the link was checked (e.g. 404 or 200)

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check the content of an email
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>(subject|body-html|body-plain|from)) of the (?<position>\d+)(?:(st|nd|rd|th))? mailgun email for (?<email>[^\s]+) (?<operator>(should contain|should not contain|should be)) (?<expectation>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: The nth message to check from the email's inbox
The operator to use when performing the validation. Current supported values are: should contain, should not contain, and should be

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check the number of emails received
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /there should be (?<count>\d+) emails? in mailgun for (?<email>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Create or update an Iterable Contact
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /create or update an iterable contact/

expectedFieldsList.description: Where keys represent contact profile field names as represented in the Iterable API (including email).

guaranteedFieldsList.description: The date/time the Contact was created
The date/time the Contact was updated

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /delete the (?<email>.+) iterable contact/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on an Iterable Contact
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>[a-zA-Z0-9_ ]+) field on iterable contact (?<email>.+) should (?<operator>be less than|be greater than|be|contain|not be|not contain) (?<expectedValue>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (one of be less than, be greater than, be, contain, not be, or not contain)

guaranteedFieldsList.description: The date/time the Contact was created
The date/time the Contact was updated

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /add the (?<email>.+) marketo lead to smart campaign (?<campaign>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Smart campaign name or numeric id

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+) field on the (?<name>.+) marketo custom object linked to lead (?<linkValue>.+) should (?<operator>be less than|be greater than|be|contain|not be|not contain) (?<expectedValue>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a Marketo Lead's Activity
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /there should be an? (?<activityTypeIdOrName>.+) activity for marketo lead (?<email>.+) in the last (?<minutes>\d+) minutes?/

expectedFieldsList.description: The email address of the Marketo Lead
The activity type ID (number) or name
The number of minutes prior to now to use when filtering the activity feed
Represents additional parameters that should be used to validate an activity. The key in the object represents an attribute name and the value represents the expected value

stepDefinitionsList.name: Create an ON24 registrant
stepDefinitionsList.help: This step attempts to create a registrant for the given event ID.
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /create an ON24 registrant for event (?<eventId>\d+)/

expectedFieldsList.help: This ID is used to identify the ON24 event. Event IDs can be found in your ON24 event dashboard.

expectedFieldsList.description: A Map of registrant fields and their values.
expectedFieldsList.help: All required fields for this event must be included, or else the step will result in an error.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Forget an ON24 registrant
stepDefinitionsList.help: This step attempts to "forget" (or delete) a registrant for the given event ID.
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /forget that (?<email>.+) registered for ON24 event (?<eventId>\d+)/

expectedFieldsList.help: This email address is used to identify the ON24 registrant who should be forgotten / deleted.
This ID is used to identify the ON24 event that this registrant should be removed from.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on an ON24 registrant
stepDefinitionsList.help: This step attempts to find an event registrant for the given event ID and email, then checks the value of a specified registrant field.
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>.+) field on ON24 registrant (?<email>.+) for event (?<eventId>\d+) should (?<operator>be less than|be greater than|be|contain|not be|not contain) (?<expectedValue>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.help: This email address is used to find the ON24 registrant.
This ID is used to find the ON24 registrant. Event IDs can be found in your ON24 event dashboard.

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (be, not be, contain, not contain, be greater than, or be less than)

authFieldsList.help: This is the numeric Client ID, found on your API Dashboard when creating the token.
This alphanumeric string can be found on the API Dashboard.
This alphanumeric string can be found on the API Dashboard.

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /scroll to (?<depth>\d+)% of the page/

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<throttleTo>mobile|desktop) lighthouse performance score should be (?<expectedScore>\d{1,3}) or higher/

stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>status|text|url) of the current page should (?<operator>contain|not contain|be) (?<expectation>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check current page meta tag
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<metaName>.+) meta tag on the current page should (?<operator>be|contain|not contain|not be longer than|exist) ?(?<expectation>.+)?/

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (be, contain, not contain, not be longer than, exist)

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check for a specific network request
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /there should be (?<reqCount>\d+) matching network requests? for (?<baseUrl>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that a Google Floodlight tag fired
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /a floodlight tag should have fired for advertiser (?<aid>\d+), group (?<group>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+), and activity (?<atag>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Custom Variables, an optional map of variable names and their expected values

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Google Analytics tracked a pageview
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /google analytics should have tracked a pageview for tracking id (?<id>[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Tracking / Measurement ID associated with the GA instance/property (e.g. UA-75228722-5)
Parameter Checks, an optional map of Google Analytics Measurement Protocol Parameters and their expected values.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Google Analytics tracked an event
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /google analytics should have tracked an event with category (?<ec>.+) and action (?<ea>.+) for tracking id (?<id>[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Tracking / Measurement ID associated with the GA instance/property (e.g. UA-75228722-5)
Parameter Checks, an optional map of Google Analytics Measurement Protocol Parameters and their expected values.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Marketo Munchkin tracking loads
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the tracking code for munchkin account id (?<id>[a-zA-Z0-9-]+) should load/

expectedFieldsList.description: Munchkin Account ID associated with the user's Marketo instance (e.g. 460-tdh-945)

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Pardot tracking loads
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the tracking code for pardot account (?<aid>\d+) and campaign (?<cid>\d+) should have loaded/

expectedFieldsList.description: Parameter Checks, an optional map of query parameters and their expected values.
